rationale: Main flow (scan QR, select item, complete payment) covered by ConnectToVendingMachine tests (ConnectToVendingMachine TEST-1) for connection/QR and BuyItemController/CustomerService tests (BuyItemController TEST-1, CustomerServiceTest.testBuyItemSuccessSingleItem) for selection and payment processing.

Admin dashboard monitoring covered by ViewAnalytics system test and AdminService unit tests (ViewAnalytics TEST-1, AdminServiceTest.*) which validate access to analytics, sales/machine/worker/customer lists and statistics.

User registration and login flow covered by UserRegistrationFlow system tests and multiple User login unit/system tests (UserRegistrationFlow TEST-1/2/3, UserLoginTest and UserServiceTest cases) which validate registration/login and access to personalized interface including wallet/transactions.
Wallet recharge covered by RechargeBalanceController tests (RechargeBalanceController TEST-1 for success and TEST-2 for failed payment) and CustomerServiceTest.update balance unit tests.

Admin management of machines, prices, sales reports covered by AdminService, ItemService and VendingMachineService unit tests (AdminServiceTest.*, ItemService/ItemServiceTest, VendingMachineService tests) and controller tests for CRUD.

CRUD operations for users/distributors/items are exercised by multiple unit tests: UserServiceTest/UserControllerTest, ItemService tests, UserDao/ItemDao unit tests and VendingMachineService tests (UserServiceTest.*, ItemService tests, UserDaoImplTest, ItemDaoImplTest).

Vending machine maintenance (worker tasks and replenishment driven by reports) is covered indirectly by task assignment/completion tests and worker-related tests (AssignTaskController integration test, TaskCompletionTest, WorkerService tests) which validate task workflows used for maintenance.
Use case template description is a documentation artifact; there are no tests targeting this template content.
User logs in is covered by extensive login unit/system tests (UserLoginTest, UserServiceTest.loginWithValidCredentials, UserControllerTest.login_ValidCredentials...).

alternative_flow_tested.case: Credenziali errate: messaggio di errore che invita a riprovare.
Errore di sistema: messaggio di errore che invita a riprovare pi√π tardi.

rationale: Main login flow and both alternative flows are covered by UserLoginTest system tests (success, incorrect credentials, system error) and by unit login failure tests (UserServiceTest.loginWithInvalidPassword etc.).
Buy item interaction covered by BuyItemController and CustomerService buy item tests (BuyItemController TEST-1, CustomerServiceTest.testBuyItemSuccessSingleItem).
Recharge account covered by RechargeBalanceController and related unit tests (RechargeBalanceController TEST-1, TransactionServiceTest, CustomerControllerTest.testRechargeBalance).
Connect to vending machine is covered by ConnectToVendingMachine system/unit tests (ConnectToVendingMachine TEST-1 success plus error cases) and ConnectionDao unit/integration tests.

Main buy item flow and both alternatives covered by BuyItemController and CustomerService unit/system tests (CustomerServiceTest.testBuyItemSuccess*, .testBuyItemInsufficientBalance, .testBuyItemOutOfStock).
Recharge Balance main flow and failed payment alternative covered by RechargeBalanceController system tests (success and failed payment) and TransactionService/CustomerService unit tests.
Worker viewing task details is covered by task-related controller/integration tests (AssignTaskController, TaskDao/TaskController tests) that include task retrieval and view operations.

Mark task as completed covered by TaskCompletionTest and WorkerService/WorkerController unit tests (TaskCompletionTest TEST-1, WorkerServiceTest.testChangeTaskStatusSuccess, WorkerControllerTest.taskCompleted_returnsTrue...).

alternative_flow_tested.case: Errore nel salvataggio: messaggio di errore.

rationale: Main completion flow and save-error alternative covered by TaskCompletionTest and TaskController/TaskDao integration tests (TaskControllerTest error handling, TaskDaoImplTest.integration_CRUD_flow UPDATE).

alternative_flow_tested.case: Errore di caricamento: messaggio di errore.

rationale: View Analytics main flow covered by ViewAnalytics system test; loading/error handling is exercised by AdminService unit tests that include DAO-null/error scenarios (AdminServiceTest.*ThrowsIfDaoNull).
Manage Workers CRUD covered by WorkerService unit tests and WorkerController tests (WorkerServiceTest.* and WorkerControllerTest cases validating CRUD and task interactions).
Manage Vending Machines CRUD covered by VendingMachineService unit tests and VendingMachineCreation integration tests (VendingMachineService TEST-6, VendingMachineCreationTest cases).
Assign Task flow covered by AssignTaskController integration test which validates task assignment and associated views.
View Tasks covered indirectly by AssignTaskController and TaskDao/TaskController tests that provide task retrieval and listing functionality.

alternative_flow_tested.case: Errore nel salvataggio: messaggio e richiesta di riprovare.

rationale: Vending machine creation main and alternatives covered by VendingMachineCreationTest suite (success, missing fields, persistence verification, and save-error tests).

Access Customer Dashboard (navigation/decision point) is not directly targeted by any explicit test; related features (balance, transactions, checkout) are tested but no test specifically validates the dashboard decision/navigation itself.

Access Worker Dashboard (navigation/decision point) has no explicit tests targeting the dashboard entry/navigation; task-related tests exercise task actions but not the dashboard decision point itself.
Access Admin Dashboard decision point is covered by ViewAnalytics and AdminService tests which validate admin access to analytics and dashboard data (ViewAnalytics TEST-1, AdminServiceTest.*).

Viewing balance page (navigation and 'go back' behavior) is not explicitly covered by tests; balance update/read operations exist but no explicit test verifies the customer balance page navigation or the 'go back' alternative.

Transaction history viewing (and the 'go back' alternative) has no explicit UI/navigation test; transaction creation and DAO tests exist but no dedicated test verifies viewing the transaction history page or the go-back behavior.

Checkout flow covered by BuyItem and Connect tests (BuyItemController, CustomerServiceTest.*) and connection success covered by ConnectToVendingMachine tests; both main checkout and connection success are tested.

Worker selecting a task and completing it covered by AssignTaskController, TaskCompletionTest and WorkerController/WorkerService unit tests which validate selecting and completing tasks from the dashboard.
View Analytics as Admin is covered by the ViewAnalytics system test and AdminService unit tests that retrieve analytics data (ViewAnalytics TEST-1, AdminServiceTest.*).
Use Case Structure (documentation of use case fields) is not a runtime behavior and has no tests targeting it.

Tracking active connections (recording user_id, machine_id, start time) is covered by connection unit/integration tests (ConnectionDaoImplTest.unit_createConnection_persistsConnection, ConnectionDaoImplTest.integration_CRUD_flow CREATE) and CustomerServiceTest.testConnectSuccess.
Remote maintenance feature (remote unlocking/stuck product management) has no explicit tests in the suite; no system/unit tests mention remote management actions.
